isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL 4X2 AND 6X4 SPRING SUSPENSION WITH TORQUE RODS - SERVICE - INSTALL SUSPENSION (SPRINGS) (Figure 7 and Figure 8 )

svcproc.title: INSTALL SUSPENSION (SPRINGS) ( Figure 7and Figure 8)
svcproc.para: When assembling suspension, all bolts are to be installed with bolt heads to the inside of frame unless otherwise specified.

step1.para: Install leaf spring assemblies on bottom U-bolt seat with short end of spring assembly toward equalizer. Install spacers in same location from which they were removed in disassembly.
Install spring retaining pins in spring brackets and equalizer bracket.
Assemble top U-bolt seat, U-bolts and U-bolt plate. Install U-bolt nuts and tighten securely. Do not torque at this time.
nstall torque rods. Position alignment shims in the locations from which they were removed in disassembly. Tighten torque rod mounting bolts and nuts to specified torque. Refer to TORQUE CHART.
Install wheels and tires. Refer to GROUP 17 WHEELS in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
Torque U-bolts diagonally and evenly with wheels on the ground. Refer to TORQUE CHART for specifications.
After suspension has been assembled, it must be checked for alignment before returning vehicle to service. Refer to GROUP 03 - SPRING SUSPENSION ALIGNMENT in the CTS-5000 Master Service manual.

note.para: After vehicle has been returned to service, spring U-bolts must be retightened at the intervals specified under MAINTENANCE.
